# AdsLoom

## Example of AdsLoom's widget implementation

```html
<amp-embed
  width="200"
  height="200"
  type="adsloom"
  layout="responsive"
  data-widget-id="WIDGET_ID"
>
</amp-embed>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration, please contact AdsLoom.

### Required parameters

-   `widget-id`: Widget ID
